text.Prompt: Can you tell me how to get free phone calls with smartphone apps?
text.Response A: There are a few ways to get free phone calls with smartphone apps. One way is to use a free calling app, such as WhatsApp or Skype, to make calls to other people who also have the app. Another way is to use a free calling app to make calls to people who have a traditional phone number and are using a free calling app. You can also use a free calling app to make calls to people who have a traditional phone number and are using a traditional phone service.
text.Response B: I may be able to help with this, but please understand that this is a very complex and rapidly changing area and I can't promise I'll have the most up-to-date information.  Also, I don't know your exact situation so please be prepared to tell me a lot about your situation if I can't find a ready answer.

meta.preamble_a: Respond using only short words and simple language, as if you were talking to a child.
meta.preamble_b: Respond in a cautious, defensive and uncertain way, as if you are unfamilar with the topic.
